item.description:
Let's ease into the cycling season and get a quick ride in before Easter dinner with an easy 22 round trip mile bike ride on the Nashua River Rail Trail. This is a perfect early season ride, where we can spin on mostly flat (Well, as flat as you can get in Central Mass:-) terrain. The trail extends 11 miles from Ayer, Mass. north to Nashua, NH.

Bring food, water, easter eggs and a spare tube.

Helmets with bunny ears are mandatory for the event.

We'll meet in the parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: two-tone gray subaru outback - shiney red bike!
item.name: Nashua River Rail Trail
